title: Best of the Program | Guest: Sara Gonzales | 10/13/19
description:
If you’re offended by gingerbread men, Target has a “gender-inclusive gingerbread” sweater for you! Sex ed classes now teach gender fluidity to kids, and when PragerU asked college students how many genders there are, they looked afraid to offend anyone. Adam Schiff’s big day is here! Public impeachment hearings have begun, and it’s more of the same. But Glenn will lay out everything the Deep State is HIDING tonight at 8 p.m. ET. Watch “The Democrats’ Hydra” on BlazeTV or for free on Facebook and YouTube! BlazeTV’s Sara Gonzales joins with a preview of how much evidence we actually have. But Schiff is already planning to insist it’s all conspiracy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
